text: (ai shakhs) kya toone itana bhee nahin dekha ki jitanee makhalooqaat saare aasamaan aur zameen mein hain aur parinden par phailae (garaz sab) usee ko tasbeeh kiya karate hain sab ke sab apanee namaaz aur apanee tasbeeh ka tareeqa khoob jaanate hain aur jo kuchh ye kiya karate hain khuda usase khoob vaaqiph hai
